endpoints.name: service
endpoints.title: Get service API details
endpoints.description: This document, which describes this service in detail.

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.title: Get trophy(ies) data
endpoints.description: Get trophy(ies) data matching the given query parameters. Example: /get?trophyId=SomeTrophyId

endpoints.name: insert
endpoints.title: Insert a trophy document
endpoints.description: Insert the JSON representation of a trophy object into the trophys collection. Full trophy object must be passed via document body.

endpoints.name: update
endpoints.title: Update a trophy document
endpoints.description: Update an existing trophy in the database. Full trophy object must be passed via document body.

endpoints.name: delete
endpoints.title: Delete a trophy document
endpoints.description: Delete trophy with the matching trophyId. Example: /delete/SometrophyId

arguments.name: trophyId
arguments.description: trophyId is a string GUID that identifies the trophy document.

endpoints.name: regenerate-default-trophies
endpoints.title: Regenerate default trophy data
endpoints.description: Regenerates (delete/insert) default MMJS trophy documents from the default-trophy-list.json file.
